position: Core Analytics (PPO) @ BlackRock | Risk @ SAS Global | Research @ ISB, IIM-A | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Formulated multiple Machine Learning algorithms to analyse investing patterns among venture capitalists and Angel investors in India.Conducted a thorough study using ML algorithms to identify the impact of the background and Curriculum Vitae of an entrepreneur on their odds of bagging a deal from a venture capital firm to highlight key parameters for entrepreneurial success.
experience.description_html: Formulated multiple Machine Learning algorithms to analyse investing patterns among venture capitalists and Angel investors in India.Conducted a thorough study using ML algorithms to identify the impact of the background and Curriculum Vitae of an entrepreneur on their odds of bagging a deal from a venture capital firm to highlight key parameters for entrepreneurial success. <!---->

experience.title: Risk Management Intern
experience.description: Formulated custom algorithms to carry out valuation of numerous European and American OTC forwards, swaps and options.Conducted a thorough algorithmic risk analysis of the above mentioned instruments using Historical, Monte Carlo as well as Hybrid stimulations. Prepared thorough reports encompassing my recommendations on risk minimising investments and assisted the senior technical consultant in carrying out transactions with the stakeholders.
experience.description_html: Formulated custom algorithms to carry out valuation of numerous European and American OTC forwards, swaps and options.Conducted a thorough algorithmic risk analysis of the above mentioned instruments using Historical, Monte Carlo as well as Hybrid stimulations. Prepared thorough reports encompassing my recommendations on risk minimising investments and assisted the senior technical consultant in carrying out transactions with the stakeholders. <!---->

positions.subtitle: Business Club, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: B-Club, IIT Kharagpur, is a non-profit organization aiming to familiarize its members, with the technicalities of analytics,finance and consultancy. We strive to enhance our knowledge through in-house sessions, presentations, hands-on workshops and discussions. Matters deliberated vary from practical problems to hypothetical ones. The club serves as an excellent interface among students, professionals, faculty and alumni and develops the members into creative thinkers and strategists much before they step into the big world of business

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs, team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. Worked on facets like Networking, Publications, and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.
